EmailTemplate.name: HEAL YB Rave2Raise CLONE
EmailTemplate.subject: #Rave2Raise Ticket Release!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
You are exclusively invited to attend...
#Rave2Raise
Raise money for a local charity by raving: what could be better?!
Date: Saturday 26th April
Time: 16:00-20:00
Venue: Ealing Green Hall (W55QT)
Come to #Rave2Raise! The Harrow and Ealing Youth Board that YOU elected have organised an evening of arts-based performances, open mic and DJ-set rave all in aid of local charity The Ignite Trust.
Have a salsa lesson, get your face-painted, enjoy a football game, see some dance and rap performances and get your UV paint ready for a rave!
Most importantly, don't miss a chance to reunite with your wave from Summer 2013 and have an awesome time with a local DJ master.
Friends welcome!
SIGN UP
**Limited spaces! Sign up in advance here to make sure you've got the hottest ticket in Ealing via Eventbrite.**
Tickets are Â£3.00 on the door.
Show your friends you're coming on Facebook, here.
